spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Dralmorrer is a 7th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Dralmorrer has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Dralmorrer has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

trait.name: Weapon Bond
entries: Provided his longsword is on the same plane Dralmorrer can take a bonus action to teleport it to his hand.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dralmorrer attacks twice, either with his longsword or dagger.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.
